text: Hi Rebecca -  sorry for the slow reply.  I was off ill for a few days last week and so I'm still playing catch up.  It is amazing how quickly the emails build up when I'm off for a few days. Things are quite busy for me at the moment as I have had someone new start working for me in our New York office so I have had to spend quite a lot of time getting her up and running.
I checked and it looks like you can send 1GB through the slack platform - if that is not enough let me know and we can work out another way for you to share it.
